name: CloudFormationExecuteChangeSet
description: Executes an AWS CloudFormation change set to create or update a stack.
author: Amazon Web Services
helpMarkDown: Please refer to [AWS CloudFormation User Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/) for more information on working with AWS CloudFormation.

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'Manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWS'.

inputs.name: changeSetName
inputs.label: Change Set Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the change set that you want execute.

inputs.name: stackName
inputs.label: Stack Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The stack name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the stack associated with the change set. This value is required if you specified the name of a change set to execute. If the change set ARN was specified this field is optional.

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that will contain the ID of the stack on task completion. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the stack ID in subsequent tasks.

messages.ExecutingChangeSet: Executing change set %s, associated with stack %s
messages.ExecuteChangeSetFailed: Request to execute change set failed with message: %s
messages.WaitingForStackUpdate: Waiting for stack %s to reach update complete status
messages.WaitingForStackCreation: Waiting for stack %s to reach create complete status
messages.StackUpdated: Execution of change set to update stack %s completed successfully
messages.StackCreated: Execution of change set to create stack %s completed successfully
messages.StackUpdateFailed: Failed to update stack %s, error message: %s
messages.StackCreationFailed: Failed to create stack %s, error message: %s
messages.SettingOutputVariable: Setting stack ID into output variable %s
